trans-unit.source: Represents an attribute indicating that a service operation is logically a retrieval operation and that it can be called by the WCF REST programming model.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute> attribute is applied to a service operation in addition to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute> and associates the operation with a <xref:System.UriTemplate> as well as the HTTP protocol Get verb.
The association with HTTP Get verb means that the operation is used to retrieve information from the service.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute> attribute is a *passive* operation behavior (the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior> methods do nothing) that adds metadata to the operation description.

Applying the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute> attribute to a service operation has no effect unless a behavior that is looking for this metadata in the operation description (such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior>) is added to the service's behavior collection.
Service operations with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute> attribute applied should be logical retrieval operations.
The HTTP GET method is associated with all operations marked with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute> attribute.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute"></xref> class.
Gets and sets the body style of the messages that are sent to and from the service operation.
When set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle.Bare>, the result of the service operation is written directly to the body of the response message.
One of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle"></xref> enumeration values.
Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute.IsBodyStyleSetExplicitly"></xref> property.
This property is designed to be used by the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] infrastructure and should never be set from user code.
A value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute.BodyStyle"></xref> property is set.
Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute.IsRequestFormatSetExplicitly"></xref> property.
This property is designed to be used by the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] infrastructure and should never be set from user code.
A value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute.RequestFormat"></xref> property was set.
Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute.IsResponseFormatSetExplicitly"></xref> property.
This property is designed to be used by the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] infrastructure and should never be set from user code.
A value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute.ResponseFormat"></xref> property was set.
Gets and sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute.RequestFormat"></xref> property.
This property determines the format of requests made to a service operation.
The two possible values are `Xml` and `Json`.
One of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref> enumeration values.
Gets and sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute.ResponseFormat"></xref> property.
This property determines the format of responses sent from a service operation.
The two possible values are `Xml` and `Json`.
One of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref> enumeration values.
Gets and sets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) template for the service operation.
URI templates are used to determine which requests get dispatched to which service operations.
URI templates allow you to map a URI or a set of URIs to a service operation.
[!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] URI templates, see [UriTemplate and UriTemplateTable](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/uritemplate-and-uritemplatetable.md).
The URI template for the service operation.

Implements the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior.AddBindingParameters(System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription,System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection)"></xref> method.
This method does nothing because the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute> attribute is a passive operation behavior.

Implements the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior(System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription,System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientOperation)"></xref> method.
This method does nothing because the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute> attribute is a passive operation behavior.

Implements the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior(System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription,System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchOperation)"></xref> method.
This method does nothing because the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute> attribute is a passive operation behavior.
Implements the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior.Validate(System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription)"></xref> method.
This method does nothing because the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute> attribute is a passive operation behavior.
